author: jackcarey (jackcarey.co.uk)
description: A collection of web components for a variety purposes.
name: web-components

scripts.build-docs: npm i && node scripts/install-deps-at-root.mjs && node scripts/generate-pkg-readmes.mjs && node scripts/generate-root-readme.mjs && node scripts/generate-storybook-docs.mjs && npm run build-storybook
scripts.build: npm run build-docs && npm run build-storybook
scripts.test-ci: npm run build-storybook && concurrently -k -s first -n "SB,TEST" -c "magenta,blue" "npx http-server docs --silent --port 6006" "wait-on tcp:6006 && npm run test"
scripts.serve-ci: npm run build-docs && npm run storybook
